title: Getaway Death
description: Olivia Greer's trip to the small town of Lily Rock has not been the relaxing getaway she hoped for.She was run off the road by a tailgater.Rescued by a handsome stranger.A friend was found dead.Oh, and now Olivia is the prime suspect in the murder.She really should have stayed home.Stranded in town as the investigation continues, Olivia must come to her own defense and uncover the secrets lurking beneath Lily Rock’s surface. In this seemingly sweet burg full of quirky characters, it’s easy to get swept up in its charm. But who can she truly trust in this town full of strangers? And who seeks to bury her beneath Lily Rock?
author: Bonnie  Hardy
